data.actual_result: Discord takes half a minute before the button changes to show that your camera is on, but still shows your screenshare not camera (asked the person I started a call with and they reported seeing my screenshare and not camera)
data.expected_result: Discord turns on your camera immediately
data.short_description: Attempting to turn on the camera via the mini box when screensharing registers the camera as on but still shows the screenshare
data.steps_to_repro: - DM call someone or join a VC in a server with screenshare - Start sharing your screen - Switch to a server so you have the mini box that shows your screen - Press the "Turn on camera" button
